com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition

Class SpenSignatureVerification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition.SpenSignatureVerification

  • public final class SpenSignatureVerification
extends Object
    This class provides methods for signature verification.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpenSignatureVerification.ResultListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for getting signature recognition results.

    • Method Detail

      • getMinimumRequiredCount

        public int getMinimumRequiredCount()
        Get the minimum number of signatures required for the signature engine to verify a signature.
        Signatures required can vary from engine to engine.
        Returns:
        The minimum number of signatures required by the engine.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the signature verification plug-in cannot be loaded.

      • register

        public void register(List<SpenObjectStroke> stroke)
              throws Exception
        Register a signature.
        This method registers one signature at a time. Call this method repeatedly to register multiple signatures. The minimum number of signatures required can vary from engine to engine.
        Parameters:
        stroke - The list of strokes of the signature that you want to registered.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the signature verification plug-in is not loaded.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the stroke passed is invalid.
        Exception - Thrown when the signature verification engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        getMinimumRequiredCount(), unregisterAll()

      • unregisterAll

        public void unregisterAll()
        Remove all the registered signatures.
        You cannot remove a signature selectively. You can only remove all the signatures at once.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the signature verification engine is not loaded yet.
        See Also:
        register(List)

      • getRegisteredCount

        public int getRegisteredCount()
        Get the number of registered signatures.
        Returns:
        The number of registered signatures.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the signature verification engine is not loaded yet.
        See Also:
        register(List), getMinimumRequiredCount()

      • setVerificationLevel

        public void setVerificationLevel(int level)
        Set the specified security level for signature verification.
        Higher levels provide more security.
        Parameters:
        level - The security level for signature verification.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the signature verification plug-in is not loaded yet.
        See Also:
        getVerificationLevel(), VERIFICATION_LEVEL_HIGH, VERIFICATION_LEVEL_MEDIUM, VERIFICATION_LEVEL_LOW

      • getVerificationLevel

        public int getVerificationLevel()
        Get the current security level for signature verification.
        Returns:
        The current signature level.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the signature verification plug-in is not loaded yet.
        See Also:
        setVerificationLevel(int)

      • request

        public void request(List<SpenObjectStroke> stroke)
             throws Exception
        Verify the specified stroke input and request the results.
        The response for this method is returned asynchronously. To receive the results, register your SpenSignatureVerification.ResultListener instance.
        Parameters:
        stroke - The list of input strokes for signature verification.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the signature verification engine is not loaded.
        Exception - Thrown when the engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        setResultListener(ResultListener)

      • setResultListener

        public void setResultListener(SpenSignatureVerification.ResultListener listener)
                       throws Exception
        Set the SpenSignatureVerification.ResultListener instance to receive results for the request(List) method.
        You can call request(List) after setting the listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The ResultListener instance to receive results for the request(List) method.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown when the engine returns an error.
        See Also:
        request(List)
